response.overview: The films in this set are a snapshot of the various phases of Monty Banks' silent film career and provide a great overview of his developing comedy style, as well as showing his incredible agility as a top-notch stunt performer. The films have been sourced from film archives around the world and then scanned, restored and, in some cases, reconstructed to provide the most complete versions possible, which will help you to get to know, appreciate and enjoy our new friend, little Monty Banks.
response.title: Monty Banks - Silent Comedian (1918-1927)
